alert.note: Alert for Western Millard and Juab Counties (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 15 at 2:17PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of north central Millard and southeastern Juab Counties through 300 PM MDT... At 216 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 10 miles northwest of Delta. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Abraham, Sugarville and Sutherland. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
